title: This is just a prank bro
body:
Dear Rito Senpais  
This week I've been struggling to get an S, I deserve an S because I'm a trash player, If you don't give me an S give me some cookies, milk or muffin atleast before I come to your house and take it all. 
-A bronze V player (me) trying to get an S please welp by fixing your grading system ;-;

-Heart Eye Emoji, :) , ^^, ^_^

Last thing, SAVE ME!!!!!!!!!!!!!

replies.body: Don't just ask for an s just because you can't get one. You can improve on League of Legends and be better of you don't get s because you can look at the things you can improve and get better grades towards that special S
use your head {{summoner:2}} and dont be like a bad player{{champion:161}} < be like vel'koz

> [{quoted}](name=ImAlbert,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=ZEBP4m8d,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-06-14T09:31:52.240+0000)
>
> **HOW TO GET AN S 2016 NO HACKS NO CHEATS NO SURVEY (Prank gone wrong)**
> Play champions like these in norms or ranked, doesn't matter {{champion:105}} {{champion:107}}  {{champion:121}} {{champion:17}} {{champion:33}} {{champion:83}}
> After selecting one of those champions in champion select, all you have to do is KS.

LOL

> [{quoted}](name=ImAlbert,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=ZEBP4m8d,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2016-06-14T09:36:32.026+0000)
>
> Oh yeah, don't forget to be sportsmanlike by saying stuff like "HAHA U GUYS CANT GET A KILL U SUCK".

lol
